actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Edward M. Fleming Construction Co., Inc., a corporation, in the process of liquidation represented by its surviving board of directors.

summary.text: Provides for the relief of Edward M. Fleming Construction Co., Inc., a corporation, in the process of liquidation represented by its surviving board of directors.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Edward M. Fleming Construction Co., Inc., a corporation, in the process of liquidation represented by its surviving board of directors.
